How do I get a token?

Start by opening your browser and going to https://discord.com/developers/applications

Now click on the "New Application" button and give your application a name

In the menu on the left, click on the "Bot" option

Scroll down and enable all the privileged intents.

Make sure you save your changes!

Now navigate back up to the top of the page, and clikc on the "Reset Token" button.

Your token will now appear, with the option to copy the token or reset it again!
